summary: An email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing receipt of a draft OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) report regarding Epstein and asking about sharing it with the team. The email indicates technical issues with forwarding the report itself.

events.title: OPR Draft Report Received
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York received a draft report from the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) regarding Epstein.

keyFacts: A draft OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) report regarding Epstein was received by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on August 6, 2020.
The email indicates technical issues with forwarding the OPR report via Outlook.
The sender seeks permission to share the OPR draft report with their team.
The document shows internal DOJ communication about an OPR investigation related to Epstein.
